metadata.title: RHSA-2009:1278 -- lftp security and bug fix update (Low)
metadata.description: An updated lftp package that fixes one security issue and various bugs is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5. This update has been rated as having low security impact by the Red Hat Security Response Team. LFTP is a sophisticated file transfer program for the FTP and HTTP protocols. Like bash, it has job control and uses the readline library for input. It has bookmarks, built-in mirroring, and can transfer several files in parallel. It is designed with reliability in mind.

extend_definition.comment: The operating system installed on the system is Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5
The operating system installed on the system is CentOS Linux 5.x
